alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 4:32PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MENDOCINO AND SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM PST... At 432 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Healdsburg, or 18 miles northwest of Santa Rosa, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeport, Middletown, Clearlake, Seigler Springs, Forest Lake, Adams, Loch Lomond, Mount Konocti, Anderson Springs, Hobergs, Ettawa Springs, Soda Bay, Hopland, Konocti Bay, Whispering Pines, Finley, Hidden Valley Lake, Kelseyville, Lower Lake, and Cobb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
